sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../index.css"; // Підключаємо файл стилів export default function Team1() { const [selectedPlayer, setSelectedPlayer] = useState(null); const [backgroundImage, setBackgroundImage] = useState(null); // Додано стан для фонового зображення const goalkeepers = [ { name: "Menyan Mike", age: 28, minutesPlayed: 1800, goals: 0, yellowCards: 1, redCards: 0, assists: 1, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/191210/image", position: "Goalkeeper" }, { name: "Mirante Antonio", age: 40, minutesPlayed: 90, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 0, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/27955/image", position: "Goalkeeper" }, { name: "Sportiello Marco", age: 31, minutesPlayed: 180, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 0, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/176301/image", position: "Goalkeeper" } ]; const defenders = [ // Ваш код для захисників... { name: "Bartezaghi Davide", age: 18, minutesPlayed: 70, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 0, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/1390489/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Gabbia Matteo", age: 24, minutesPlayed: 367, goals: 1, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 1, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/826195/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Hernandez Theo", age: 26, minutesPlayed: 1787, goals: 3, yellowCards: 2, redCards: 7, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/788027/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Kjaer Simon", age: 34, minutesPlayed: 932, goals: 0, yellowCards: 1, redCards: 1, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/21535/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Calabria Davide", age: 27, minutesPlayed: 1551, goals: 0, yellowCards: 3, redCards: 5, assists: 1, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/318607/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Kalulu Pierre", age: 23, minutesPlayed: 110, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 0, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/965330/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Tomori Fikayo", age: 26, minutesPlayed: 1384, goals: 3, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 4, assists: 1, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/788255/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Thiaw Malick", age: 22, minutesPlayed: 924, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 3, assists: 1, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/1014286/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Florenzi Alessandro", age: 32, minutesPlayed: 945, goals: 0, yellowCards: 2, redCards: 4, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/152420/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Jimenez Alejandro", age: 18, minutesPlayed: 58, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 1, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/1184308/image", position: "Defender" }, { name: "Simic Jan-Carlo", age: 18, minutesPlayed: 121, goals: 1, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 0, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/1214992/image", position: "Defender" } ]; const midfielders = [ // Ваш код для півзахисників... { name: "Adli Yacine", age: 23, minutesPlayed: 858, goals: 1, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 2, assists: 4, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/859024/image", position: "Midfielder" }, { name: "Bennacer Ismael", age: 26, minutesPlayed: 292, goals: 0, yellowCards: 1, redCards: 1, assists: 8, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/823733/image", position: "Midfielder" }, { name: "Loftus-Cheek Ruben", age: 28, minutesPlayed: 1352, goals: 5, yellowCards: 1, redCards: 4, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/284441/image", position: "Midfielder" }, { name: "Musah Yunus", age: 21, minutesPlayed: 970, goals: 0, yellowCards: 1, redCards: 4, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/983815/image", position: "Midfielder" }, { name: "Pobega Tommaso", age: 24, minutesPlayed: 300, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 0, assists: 14, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/928796/image", position: "Midfielder" }, { name: "Reijnders Tijjani", age: 25, minutesPlayed: 1921, goals: 2, yellowCards: 2, redCards: 5, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/893549/image", position: "Midfielder" }, { name: "Terracciano Filippo", age: 21, minutesPlayed: 4, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 1, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/1034303/image", position: "Midfielder" }, { name: "Zeroli Kevin", age: 19, minutesPlayed: 19, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 0, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/1397348/image", position: "Midfielder" } ]; const forwards = [ // Ваш код для нападників... { name: "Giroud Olivier", age: 37, minutesPlayed: 1504, goals: 11, yellowCards: 8, redCards: 1, assists: 1, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/39070/image", position: "Forward" }, { name: "Jovic Luka", age: 26, minutesPlayed: 520, goals: 5, yellowCards: 1, redCards: 2, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/319129/image", position: "Forward" }, { name: "Kamarda Francesco", age: 15, minutesPlayed: 14, goals: 0, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 0, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/1520771/image", position: "Forward" }, { name: "Leao Rafael", age: 24, minutesPlayed: 1488, goals: 3, yellowCards: 6, redCards: 3, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/851284/image", position: "Forward" }, { name: "Okafor Noah", age: 23, minutesPlayed: 457, goals: 4, yellowCards: 0, redCards: 1, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/865523/image", position: "Forward" }, { name: "Pulisic Christian", age: 25, minutesPlayed: 1536, goals: 6, yellowCards: 5, redCards: 1, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/817957/image", position: "Forward" }, { name: "Chukwueze Samuel", age: 24, minutesPlayed: 545, goals: 0, yellowCards: 1, redCards: 0, assists: 0, photo: "https://api.sofascore.app/api/v1/player/822470/image", position: "Forward" } ]; const openPlayerModal = (player) => { setSelectedPlayer(player); setBackgroundImage(player.photo); // Встановлення URL фону при відкритті футболіста }; const closePlayerModal = () => { setSelectedPlayer(null); setBackgroundImage(null); // Зняття фону при закритті вікна футболіста }; return (
{/* Відображення воротарів */} {goalkeepers.map((player, index) => (
openPlayerModal(player)}>

{player.name.split(' ')[0]}

{player.name.split(' ')[1]}

{player.position}

))} {/* Відображення захисників */} {defenders.map((player, index) => (
openPlayerModal(player)}>

{player.name.split(' ')[0]}

{player.name.split(' ')[1]}

{player.position}

))} {/* Відображення півзахисників */} {midfielders.map((player, index) => (
openPlayerModal(player)}>

{player.name.split(' ')[0]}

{player.name.split(' ')[1]}

{player.position}

))} {/* Відображення нападників */} {forwards.map((player, index) => (
openPlayerModal(player)}>

{player.name.split(' ')[0]}

{player.name.split(' ')[1]}

{player.position}

))}
{selectedPlayer && (
×

{selectedPlayer.name}

Age: {selectedPlayer.age}

Minutes Played: {selectedPlayer.minutesPlayed}

Goals: {selectedPlayer.goals}

Assists: {selectedPlayer.yellowCards}

Yellow Cards: {selectedPlayer.assists}

Red Cards: {selectedPlayer.redCards}

)}
); }
